SKT_FIRST.name: Nimble Dance
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.\nIf the caster has <color=#28d9ed>Fierce Offensive</color>, the effect is applied to <color=#28d9ed>all allies</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPさせる。\n<color=#28d9ed>【アースエッジ】</color>がある場合、<color=#28d9ed>味方全体</color>の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>をUPさせる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가시킵니다.\n<color=#28d9ed>매서운 공세</color> 보유 시 <color=#28d9ed>아군 전체</color>에게 효과가 적용됩니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并使自身的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>。\n附带<color=#28d9ed>猛烈攻势</color>效果时,将对<color=#28d9ed>全体友军</color>生效。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: +1 turn Fierce Offensive\n+2 turns of Poisoned on target
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 【アースエッジ】+1ターン\n攻撃対象に中毒+2ターン
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 猛烈攻势+1回合\n对攻击目标造成中毒+2回合

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nTargets all enemies and increases damage dealt
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n攻撃範囲拡大およびダメージUP
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n공격 범위 확대 및 피해 증가
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n扩大攻击范围,且伤害提升

SKT_SECOND.name: Swift Support
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Triggered Effect) Activates <color=#28d9ed>Crystal Storm</color> when an ally lands a debuff on their turn.

<color=#28d9ed>Crystal Storm</color>: Attacks all enemies, and inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
If the caster has <color=#28d9ed>Fierce Offensive</color>, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Poisoned</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. If the target is a <color=#28d9ed>Healer</color>, additionally inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Silenced</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
(発動効果)味方が自分のターンで敵に弱体効果を付与した場合、<color=#28d9ed>【大地の烈斬】</color>を使用する。

<color=#28d9ed>【大地の烈斬】</color>:敵全体にダメージを与え、対象の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
<color=#28d9ed>【アースエッジ】</color>がある場合、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>中毒</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。対象が<color=#28d9ed>回復型</color>の場合、追加で<color=#28d9ed>沈黙</color>を付与する。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
(발동 효과) 아군 팀이 자신의 턴에 적에게 약화 효과 적중 시 <color=#28d9ed>결정 쇄도</color>를 사용합니다.

<color=#28d9ed>결정 쇄도</color> : 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 대상 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 감소시킵니다.
<color=#28d9ed>매서운 공세</color> 보유 시 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>중독</color>을 부여합니다. 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>회복형</color>이라면 추가적으로 <color=#28d9ed>침묵</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh:
(触发效果)友军在自身回合对敌人造成弱化效果时,使用<color=#28d9ed>晶体风暴</color>。

<color=#28d9ed>晶体风暴</color>:攻击全体敌人,并使全体目标的<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。
附带<color=#28d9ed>猛烈攻势</color>效果时,对全体敌人造成<color=#28d9ed>中毒</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。若目标为<color=#28d9ed>恢复型</color>,则额外造成<color=#28d9ed>沉默</color>效果。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Crystalline Waltz
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. After attacking, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>, and grants <color=#28d9ed>Fierce Offensive</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>UPさせ、<color=#28d9ed>【アースエッジ】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間獲得する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. 공격 후 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 증가시키고, <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>매서운 공세</color>를 획득합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人。攻击后,使自身<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升\n<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>,并获得<color=#28d9ed>猛烈攻势</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Action Points of the caster and the next Skill Chain caster by <color=#28d9ed>25</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、自分と次のチェーンスキル参加者のAPを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신과 다음 스킬 체인 수행자의 AP를 <color=#28d9ed>25</color> 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由效果</color>:攻击后,使自身和下一顺序的友军AP恢复<color=#28d9ed>25</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,使自身<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
